text: Wacław Józef Swierzawski (14 May 1927 - 7 October 2017) was a Polish Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1949, Swierzawski served as bishop of the Diocese of Sandomierz, Poland, from 1992 to 2002.Diocese of Dandomierz Swierzawski died on 7 October 2017 in Zawichost, Poland at the age of 90.Bishop Wacław Józef Świerzawski ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops
title: Wacław Józef Świerzawski
